headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation Check As Insider Buying And Expanded Buybacks Follow Strong Q4 Performance
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) is back in focus after CEO William McDermott and other senior executives scrapped planned stock sales, with McDermott committing to buy US$3 million of shares as the company expands its buyback program. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. Those insider moves come after a sharp reset in the share price, with a 30 day share price return of a 15.32% decline and a year to date share price return of a 26.88% decline, even though the 3 year total shareholder return is still...
